name: Preferences

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: colorPicker
properties.description: The color picker to use.

properties.name: interpolation
properties.description: The method to use to assign color values to any new pixels created when an image is resampled or resized.

properties.name: exportClipboard
properties.description: If true, retains Adobe Photoshop contents on the clipboard after you exit the application.

properties.name: showToolTips
properties.description: If true, pop-up definitions are displayed on mouseover.

properties.name: keyboardZoomResizesWindows
properties.description: If true, automatically resizes the window when zooming in or out using keyboard shortcuts.

properties.name: autoUpdateOpenDocuments
properties.description: If true, automatically updates open documents.

properties.name: showAsianTextOptions
properties.description: If true, Asian text options are displayed in the Paragraph palette.

properties.name: beepWhenDone
properties.description: If true, alerts the user when a process finishes.

properties.name: dynamicColorSliders
properties.description: If true, dynamic color sliders appear in the Color palette.

properties.name: savePaletteLocations
properties.description: If true, makes new palette locations the default location.

properties.name: showEnglishFontNames
properties.description: If true, Asian font names are listed in English.

properties.name: useShiftKeyForToolSwitch
properties.description: If true, enables cycling through a set of hidden tools.

properties.name: textFontSize
properties.description: Size of the small font used in panels and dialogs.

properties.name: numberOfHistoryStates
properties.description: The number of history states to preserve. Range: 1 to 100.

properties.name: createFirstSnapshot
properties.description: If true, automatically makes the first snapshot when a new document is created.

properties.name: nonLinearHistory
properties.description: If true, allows non-linear history.

properties.name: smartQuotes
properties.description: If true, curly quote marks are used.

properties.name: imagePreviews
properties.description: The behavior mode to use when saving files.

properties.name: iconPreview
properties.description: If true, shows the image preview as a thumbnail.

properties.name: fullSizePreview
properties.description: If true, shows the image preview as a full size image.

properties.name: macOSThumbnail
properties.description: If true, creates a thumbnail when saving the image in Mac OS.

properties.name: windowsThumbnail
properties.description: If true, creates a thumbnail when saving the image in Windows. (Requires hardware support.)

properties.name: appendExtension
properties.description: Save files with extensions on Windows.

properties.name: useLowerCaseExtension
properties.description: If true, the file extension is lowercase.

properties.name: askBeforeSavingLayeredTIFF
properties.description: If true, asks the user to verify layer preservation options when saving a file in TIFF format.

properties.name: maximizeCompatibility
properties.description: The behavior to use to check whether to maximize compatibility when opening Adobe Photoshop (PSD) files.

properties.name: recentFileListLength
properties.description: The number of items in the recent file list. Range: 0 to 30.

properties.name: colorChannelsInColor
properties.description: If true, displays component channels in the Channels palette in color.

properties.name: useDiffusionDither
properties.description: If true, uses diffusion dither.

properties.name: pixelDoubling
properties.description: If true, halves the resolution or (doubles the size of pixels) to make previews display more quickly.

properties.name: paintingCursors
properties.description: The type of pointer to use.

properties.name: otherCursors
properties.description: The type of pointer to use.

properties.name: gridSize
properties.description: The size of grid squares.

properties.name: useVideoAlpha
properties.description: If true, enables Adobe Photoshop to send transparency information to your computer’s video board. (Requires hardware support.)

properties.name: gamutWarningOpacity
properties.description: The opacity (as a percentage) of the warning color for out-of-gamut colors. Range: 0 to 100.

properties.name: rulerUnits
properties.description: The unit that the scripting system uses when receiving and returning values.

properties.name: typeUnits
properties.description: The unit type-size that the numeric inputs are assumed to represent.

properties.name: columnWidth
properties.description: The width of columns (in points)

properties.name: columnGutter
properties.description: The gutter of columns (in points)

properties.name: pointSize
properties.description: The point/pica size.

properties.name: guideStyle
properties.description: The formatting style for non-printing guide lines.

properties.name: gridStyle
properties.description: The formatting style for non-printing grid lines.

properties.name: gridSubDivisions
properties.description: The value by which to subdivide the grid.

properties.name: showSliceNumber
properties.description: If true, displays slice numbers in the document window when using the Slice tool.

properties.name: useAdditionalPluginFolder
properties.description: If true, uses an additional folder for compatible plug-ins stored with a different application.

properties.name: additionalPluginFolder
properties.description: The path to the additional plug-in folder. Valid only when 'use additional plugin folder' = true.

properties.name: imageCacheLevels
properties.description: The number of images to hold in the cache. Range: 1 to 8.

properties.name: imageCacheForHistograms
properties.description: If true, shows the current image cache used to create the histogram.

properties.name: maxRAMuse
properties.description: Maximum percentage of available RAM used by Photoshop.

properties.name: useHistoryLog
properties.description: Turn on and off the history logging.

properties.name: saveLogItems
properties.description: Options for saving the history items.

properties.name: editLogItems
properties.description: Options for edit log items.

properties.name: saveLogItemsFile
properties.description: File to save the history log.

properties.name: fontPreviewSize
properties.description: Show font previews in the type tool font menus.

description: Options to define for the preferences property of the application object, basically equivalent to selecting Edit > Preferences (Windows) or Photoshop > Preferences in the Adobe Photoshop application.
